# foldchanger

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

foldchanger is a package for performing fold change calculations.

These calculations are used for the detection of genetic copy number variants by
next generation sequencing. I am building foldchanger as a mini-project to
teach myself R package development.
